original_text: Be kind and patient in a way that everyone can see. Remember that the Lord is near.
korean_text: 너희 관용을 모든 사람에게 알게 하라 주께서 가까우시니라

sentences.original_text: in a way that everyone can see
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 볼 수 있는 방식으로

sentences.original_text: Remember that the Lord is near
